text: Cebu City is a metropolis capital city of Visayas. It is one of the largest cities in the Philippines. It is the capital of Cebu Province. It is often called the "Queen City of the South". Cebu is the main center of Christianity in the Philippines. The city has a lot of interesting history. Cebu was a fishing village and busy trading port in 1521 when the famous explorer Ferdinand Magellan visited it and died there. The center of the city has become modern and is well developed. There are also 44 smaller towns. Cebu has recently become the favorite tourist spot of the country. Category:Cities in Cebu Category:Provincial capitals of the Philippines
title: Cebu City
